name: part_012
file: tmp_【ゲスト／ときのそら＆雪花ラミィ】歌って笑って♪ウィンターminiライブ #ノムlive【燦鳥ノムpresents】 [FXCO0xHl8R4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Instrumental transition with the 'Nom Live' logo.
Yukihana Lamy performs the song 'Step by Step'.
Instrumental transition to the next guest.
Tokino Sora introduces her next song and encourages the audience.

subtitles.original: 思いを繋げてく
subtitles.english: Connecting our feelings...

subtitles.original: 歌になる
subtitles.english: It becomes a song.

subtitles.original: 夢の数だけ夢は
subtitles.english: Dreams grow bigger

subtitles.original: 大きくなるんだって
subtitles.english: for every dream you have,

subtitles.original: 小さな頃から
subtitles.english: I should have known that

subtitles.original: 知ってたはず
subtitles.english: since I was little.

subtitles.original: 心が折れかけて
subtitles.english: Even if my heart starts to break

subtitles.original: 立ち止まってしまっても
subtitles.english: and I come to a standstill,

subtitles.original: ゴールは逃げたりしないから
subtitles.english: the goal will never run away.

subtitles.original: Step by Step ゆっくりでも
subtitles.english: Step by step, even if it's slow,

subtitles.original: 一歩ずつ前だけ見て
subtitles.english: look ahead one step at a time.

subtitles.original: 辛くても絶対に諦めない
subtitles.english: No matter how hard it is, I'll never give up.

subtitles.original: だって大切な仲間が
subtitles.english: Because my precious friends

subtitles.original: いつも側にいるから
subtitles.english: are always by my side.

subtitles.original: 行くよ！明日への境界線を
subtitles.english: Here I go! I want us all to jump over

subtitles.original: みんなでせーの飛び越えたい
subtitles.english: the boundary to tomorrow together.

subtitles.original: 繋がる絆は離れない
subtitles.english: The bond that connects us will never break.

subtitles.original: ずっと 空回りが空回し
subtitles.english: Always, even if I'm just spinning my wheels

subtitles.original: つまずくこともあるけど
subtitles.english: and stumbling sometimes,

subtitles.original: 平気、大丈夫
subtitles.english: it's okay, I'll be fine.

subtitles.original: そう仲間を信じて進め
subtitles.english: Yes, believe in your friends and move forward.

subtitles.original: 絆が深まるほど
subtitles.english: As the bond deepens,

subtitles.original: 夢は確信に変わる
subtitles.english: the dream turns into a conviction.

subtitles.original: 素敵な未来を描こうね
subtitles.english: Let's paint a wonderful future together.

subtitles.original: 一歩ずつ怖がらずに
subtitles.english: One step at a time, without fear,

subtitles.original: 声合わせて空見上げて
subtitles.english: let's raise our voices and look up at the sky.

subtitles.original: 暗闇もいつかは晴れるからね
subtitles.english: Even the darkness will clear up someday.

subtitles.original: 道に迷って落ち込む私を
subtitles.english: When I lose my way and feel down,

subtitles.original: 照らしてくれる
subtitles.english: you light the way for me.

subtitles.original: 行くよ！夢との境界線へ
subtitles.english: Here I go! Let's all jump into

subtitles.original: みんなでせーの飛び込もう
subtitles.english: the boundary of our dreams together.

subtitles.original: 思いを繋げて未来まで
subtitles.english: Let's connect our feelings until the future.

subtitles.original: ずっと 遠回りが風吹かし
subtitles.english: Always, even if the detour is windy

subtitles.original: 倒れることもあるけど
subtitles.english: and I fall down sometimes,

subtitles.original: ずっと、一緒だよ
subtitles.english: we'll always be together.

subtitles.original: さあ描いた夢まで進め
subtitles.english: Now, move forward to the dream you've envisioned.

subtitles.original: みんな、この曲はChu-Chu-Luっていう曲だよ！
subtitles.english: Everyone, this song is called 'Chu-Chu-Lu'!

subtitles.original: 手拍子とかコメントとか、たくさん一緒に楽しんでくれるととっても嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: I'd be so happy if you enjoy it with lots of clapping and comments!

subtitles.original: 男の子はいつでも
subtitles.english: Boys are always

subtitles.original: 強がりな生き物
subtitles.english: creatures that act tough.

subtitles.original: 弱さを嫌って
subtitles.english: They hate weakness

subtitles.original: 涙は流さないの
subtitles.english: and don't shed tears.
